item.title: Setting up Indieweb Homepage
item.description: Remember microformats? Me neither! Back when the web was open and we were trying to find ways to interconnect independent things? Let’s bring them back! Steps: Simple Get a domain Host your own site on it On the index page, create an h-card Inside of that h-card an identity markers. That’s it. Example You should replace this stuff with your own. Check out the standard’s documentation for more details.
